author: Special Correspondent
text:
Justice V. Ramasubramanian garlanding the statue of Mahatma Gandhi at the Republic Day celebrations in Madurai Bench of Madras High Court on Tuesday.— Photo: R. Ashok

Republic Day was celebrated in the Madras High Court Bench here with Justice V. Ramasubramanian, the administrative judge, garlanding the statue of Mahatma Gandhi, hoisting the National Flag and accepting a guard of honour accorded by the police.

He was accompanied by Justices P.R. Shivakumar, D. Hariparanthaman, C.S. Karnan, N. Kirubakaran, K. Ravichandrabaabu, S. Vaidyanathan and V.M. Velumani.

Additional Advocate General K. Chellapandian, Assistant Solicitor General G.R. Swaminathan and other advocates participated.

The Registry organised a blood donation camp inside the dispensary attached to the court buildings, besides cultural programmes by the children of HC staff and advocates.
title: R-Day celebrated in HC
